sentence: pick up the yellow block closest to the center and place it behind the red block on the left
move the foremost yellow block to the right side of the yellow block which is behind the red block
pick up the green block next to the front yellow block and place it behind the yellow block you just moved
stack the left red block on top of the second yellow block from the left
move the foremost green block to the position where the previous red block was
stack the rightmost yellow block on top of the green block you just moved
